com.topcoder.search.builder
Class SearchContext

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.search.builder.SearchContext
public class SearchContext
extends java.lang.Object

This is a State object that is used to hold the current status of building a Search. It contains any bindable parameters, as well as the existing search string. It may be used by any SearchStrategies as a convenience class to help with building the search string and relevant parameters.

Thread Safety: This class is not required to be thread safe. Only one SearchContext will be used per thread.

Version:
1.3
Author:
ShindouHikaru, TCSDEVELOPER

Constructor Detail

SearchContext

public SearchContext(java.util.Map aliasMap)

Default Constructor.

Parameters:
aliasMap - a map of strings, holding the alternate names of fields as keys and their actual values in the datastore as the respective values.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aliasMap contains null or empty String elements or non-string elements.

SearchContext

public SearchContext(com.topcoder.util.classassociations.ClassAssociator fragmentBuilderAssociations,
                     java.util.Map aliasMap)

Constructor that builds a SearchContext with the provided SearchFragmentBuilders for lookup.

fragmentBuilderAssociations may be null, to indicate that the SearchContext does not need to provide lookups.

Parameters:
fragmentBuilderAssociations - A map (Class Associator) of filter to SearchFragmentBuilder mappings. The SearchFragmentBuilders should be SQL-database oriented to be useful in this component.
aliasMap - a map of strings, holding the alternate names of fields as keys and their actual values in the datastore as the respective values.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the aliasMap is null, or aliasMap contains null or empty String elements or non-string elements for both key and value.
Method Detail

getSearchString

public java.lang.StringBuffer getSearchString()

Retrieves the Search String that is currently being built.

Returns:
the Search String that is currently being built.

getBindableParameters

public java.util.List getBindableParameters()

Retrieves a list of bindableParameters that have been accumulated during the Search Building process.

Here can not used shadow copy since it will be used to add the bindable paramters.

Returns:
a list of bindableParameters that have been accumulated during the Search Building process.

getFragmentBuilder

public SearchFragmentBuilder getFragmentBuilder(Filter filter)

Retrieves the SearchFragmentBuilder that is associated for the provided filter. If the fragmentBuilders is null, or if no association can be found, then a null is returned.

Parameters:
filter - The filter to retrieve a SearchFragmentBuidler form.
Returns:
the SearchFragmentBuilder that is associated for the provided filter.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if filter is null.

getFieldName

public java.lang.String getFieldName(java.lang.String alias)

Retrieves the field name for a provided alias. The field name will be the actual name used to distinguish the field within the datastore.

Parameters:
alias - An alias that is used as a convenient form of representing the actual field name.
Returns:
The actual field name that was represented by the alias. A null is returned if the alias could not be recognized.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the alias is null or an empty String.
